summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Frontenac Street, from Rainier Avenue to a point about 190 feet west of the west margin of 48th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8631 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
